issue.title: [Rust] Add pre-commit hook
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10952](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10952). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If a commit contains only fixes for rust format, it would be very sad to wait for the slow CI checking done, and it may block the CI checking for other PRs.

So, the PR adds  a git pre-commit hook file, which performs the **cargo fmt --check**
